item.description:
This is an all day event - come when you can - leave when you want. I'll stay up all night if I'm having fun (and usually do), just call to find out if we're still going strong. Ben 617-997-3545. I'll turn my phone off when I go to bed so feel free to call even if it's 4 or 5am.

Please bring a snack, drink or game. I have a whole host of delivery menus if anyone wants to order, but there may not be a group dinner time.

I have seating for 12 at a time, but room for more around the tables if you want to bring a chair. Give me a call if you want to know how full the place is.

I live right on the B line. Walking distance from the C and D. Easy parking on Comm. Ave. during the day, not so much at night, but I can help you find parking if you call. Resident only parking on my street.

Let me know if you need directions.

Note: These events are quite variable. The first one had a lot of food but fewer games; people arrived and left throughout the day (21 people peak of 13). The second had a ton of games and less snacks; people arrived throughout the day, but left mostly at the end of the day (13 people peak of 12). I provide some food and more games, but I like the randomness of leaving things up to chance.
item.name: Another come any time event
